Area of work:

Development of internal web-app

And embedded systems software 

 

To whomever it may concern,

I have been working for the last month as an intern at Drut, I would like to continue working there as my practice school as it it more suited for my career goal as compared to my current allotment (WILP - IOT at BITS Hyderabad)
